Package com.supenta.flitchio.sdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FlitchioListener
    Listener of Flitchio events: button state changed, joystick position changed, status changed (connected/disconnected).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonEvent
    Object used to report button events.
    FlitchioController
    Object providing the main communication channel to the Flitchio Manager app.
    FlitchioSnapshot
    Object describing a consistent state of Flitchio at a given moment.
    InputElement
    Base class describing the input elements of Flitchio: buttons and joysticks.
    InputElement.Button
    Object identifying a button of Flitchio.
    InputElement.Button.DpadButton
    Object identifying a special button of Flitchio that is actually one of the four directions of a joystick.
    InputElement.Joystick
    Object identifying a joystick of Flitchio.
    InputEvent<T extends InputElement>
    Base class for button and joystick events that are fired in listening mode.
    JoystickEvent
    Object used to report joystick events.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FlitchioManagerDependencyException
    Exception thrown when the Flitchio Manager app was not found on the system or is too old for this SDK version.
